CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Galaxy Payroll Group is a holding company incorporated in the British Virgin Islands. Our operations are conducted by our Operating Entities, which include our indirect wholly-owned subsidiaries, such as Galaxy Payroll Services, Galaxy GEO Services, Galaxy Corporate Management Consultancy (Shenzhen), Galaxy Human Resources, and Galaxy Recursos Humanos (Macau), which are incorporated in Hong Kong, PRC, Taiwan and Macau. As a reputable payroll outsourcing service, employment service and consultancy and market research service provider based in Hong Kong, the Company, through our Operating Entities, provides services to our customers which are mainly categorized as 1 channels which are global human resources service providers engaged by companies/organizations to handle payroll and/or employment-related matters for their branch offices in different regions.
